mapper.insert: INSERT INTO account_master (account_no, bank_code, pay_id, account_holder_name, account_balance, registered_date, register_id) VALUES (#{accountNo}, #{bankCode}, #{payId}, #{accountHolderName}, #{accountBalance}, #{registeredDate}, #{registerId})
mapper.select: SELECT account_no as accountNo, bank_code as bankCode, account_holder_name as accountHolderName, account_balance as accountBalance, registered_date as registeredDate, register_id as registerId FROM account_master WHERE pay_id = #{payId}
